briefTitle: Pyrotinib Combined With Trastuzumab, Dalpiciclib, Letrozole Versus TCbHP (Trastuzumab Plus Pertuzumab With Docetaxel and Carboplatin) as Neoadjuvant Treatment in HR +/HER2 + Breast Cancer
